nodes.text: Pretormin Environmental was a company which produced the GX-8 water vaporator model of moisture vaporator, which was used extensively on the desert planet Tatooine.

Pretormin Environmental was first created for Galladinium's Fantastic Technology, a supplement for West End Games' Star Wars Legends Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game released in 1995. The company was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars which was released in 2015.
